history.simulate(population, x, y, delta_t=0.001, iterations=200000)[source]

_summary_

Args:

population (int): total number of participants x (float): fraction of cooperators y (float): fraction of defectors delta_t (float, optional): _description_. Defaults to 0.001. iterations (int, optional): _description_. Defaults to 200000.
